summary: Most requested rebrand work appears implemented: updated Home hero copy/CTAs, new Home sections (Services preview, Gallery with dialog zoom, Testimonials), redesigned Services data model with Order Now WhatsApp prefill, header/footer navigation updated (no Jobs link), persistent floating WhatsApp button, and backend cafe info updated to WhatsApp number "9126026463". However, several requirements cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary (notably socialLinks WhatsApp URL format, Services page SEO, LocalBusiness JSON-LD, and presence of generated image assets under public).

missing_requirements.requirement: “Contact Now” opens https://wa.me/91<configured_number> in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
missing_requirements.reason: Hero CTA uses `socialLinks.whatsapp`, but the diff summary does not show the configured URL format (wa.me with `91` prefix) or the configured number value, so this acceptance criterion cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure each main page (Home, Services, Contact) has an appropriate title and description aligned with the new content; LocalBusiness JSON-LD remains present and valid JSON.
missing_requirements.reason: Home and Contact SEO usage is shown, but Services page SEO and the LocalBusiness JSON-LD output are not included in the diff summary, so the requirement cannot be fully verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Newly generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by tags in the Gallery section (and updated branding/hero illustration if applicable).
missing_requirements.reason: Code references images under `/assets/generated/...`, but the diff summary does not show any added files under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, so existence of the required image assets cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Services page implements three sections with the requested item counts/content (8 graphic design items, 6 school project items, 6 college assignment items) and shows icons/descriptions/prices + Order Now.
missing_requirements.reason: The services content file is truncated; the College Assignment Services list is not fully visible, so the exact completeness (e.g., total of 6 requested items) cannot be verified from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new “Why Choose Us” section on the Home page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any REQ; Home page additions requested were Services preview, Gallery, and Testimonials.

hallucinated_features.description: Added “Business Hours” content block on the Contact page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-7 required keeping contact details, form fields, and map placeholder, but did not request business hours content.
